name: Well, that skeleted quickly
description:
Unreal summer gamejam 2018 entry

This is the version without the bug of the mini skeletons:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xd3ed9mb5j7vvbq/ThatSkeletalQuickly.zip?dl=0&m=

Brief: 

you are a necromancer, your mission is to gather all the magic gems that holds the power of the 7 dragons.

Keyboard + Mouse Or GamePad Control:
 + w,a,s,d or cursors to move . - left control to move in gamepad
 + Q to invoke an skeleton   - B in gamepad
 + E to change the skeletons army command a different order (follow, kill or climb)  - Y with gamepad
 + left button mouse or z key to cast ice projectiles - RT in gamepad
 + second button mouse or x in gamepad to command
 + space to jump or A in gamepad

The mission is simple, in 3 phases 
1 ) kill farmers, create skeletons
2 ) kill guardians and stole the power diamond
3 ) survive before times goes off
